overview: Chief Operating Officer Jason Lindwall brings more than 15 years experience of producing sustained revenue growth through technology initiatives to RealPage. As chief operating officer, he is responsible for managing operations to be consistent with established goals, objectives, and policies. Prior to joining RealPage, Jason was chief information officer of Aspen Square Management where he was responsible for several technology initiatives. He successfully incorporated technology into every aspect of the business while analyzing and adjusting work procedures for maximum efficiency.
